body_html:
I got this error on windows 10 with CUDA 9.0 and GTX 1060.
python 3.5
tensorflow-gpu 1.5.0
I find a easy way to solve it : update my NVIDIA Display Driver to the newest version,reboot PC
then it worked!

body:
I got this error on windows 10 with CUDA 9.0 and GTX 1060.
python 3.5
tensorflow-gpu 1.5.0
I find a easy way to solve it : update my NVIDIA Display Driver to the newest version,reboot PC 
then it worked!
